Domino.title: Calibration Issue
Domino.message: Try resetting the sensor alignment and ensure the domino track is clear.

Domino.title: Motor Malfunction
Domino.message: Check the wiring and battery connection. Replace motor if needed.

Domino.title: Bluetooth Not Connecting
Domino.message: Restart the device and ensure it's in pairing mode.

IR TURRET.title: Not Detecting Targets
IR TURRET.message: Ensure the IR sensor is clean and properly aligned.

IR TURRET.title: Slow Movement
IR TURRET.message: Check motor power and adjust sensitivity settings.

IR TURRET.title: Connection Issues
IR TURRET.message: Reconnect to the control software and verify settings.

Label Maker.title: Paper Jamming
Label Maker.message: Open the label slot and clear any stuck paper.

Label Maker.title: Printing Faint
Label Maker.message: Replace or clean the thermal head.

Label Maker.title: Not Powering On
Label Maker.message: Ensure battery or power cable is properly connected.

Laser Tag.title: Gun Not Firing
Laser Tag.message: Check battery levels and reload the game software.

Laser Tag.title: Vest Not Registering Hits
Laser Tag.message: Ensure the IR sensor is not obstructed.

Laser Tag.title: Pairing Issues
Laser Tag.message: Reset both gun and vest, then re-pair.

Self Balance.title: Not Staying Upright
Self Balance.message: Recalibrate the gyroscope and ensure a level surface.

Self Balance.title: Wheel Misalignment
Self Balance.message: Check for loose bolts and tighten if necessary.

Self Balance.title: Bluetooth Not Connecting
Self Balance.message: Restart the device and ensure the app is up-to-date.
